questions.text: What was the name of Jeff Talley's daughter?
questions.explanation:
Amanda.

	Bruce's real-life daughter, Rumer Willis, played his daughter in the film.  She can also be seen in "Now and Then" and "Striptease".

questions.text: What was the name of the man who was holding his family hostage at the beginning of the film?
questions.explanation:
Joe.

	Jamie McShane played Joe Mack in this movie.  He held his wife and son hostage, killing them and then shooting himself.  It was because of Jeff not being able to save this family that he decided to become a police chief and give up on being a hostage negotiator.

questions.text: Walter Smith was a criminal accountant who created false accounts for individuals.  What was the name of the movie that his encrypted disc was placed into for safe keeping?
questions.explanation:
Heaven Can Wait.

	Walter placed it in the 1943 version of "Heaven Can Wait".  Reluctantly Jeff asked Tommy to get the movie.  The boy was smart enough to grab both of them not sure which one that Jeff needed.

questions.text: What type of SUV did Walter Smith drive?
questions.explanation:
Cadillac Escalade.

	Dennis, Kevin, and Mars saw this family riding around town and decided they wanted to take their SUV for a ride.

questions.text: What was the name of the woman police officer who was shot and killed by Mars?
questions.explanation:
Carol.

	Marjean Holden played the role of Carol Flores, the officer who gets shot when she goes to investigate the silent alarm at the Smith home.

questions.text: What did Jeff Talley tell Officer Mike Anders NOT to wear to work?
questions.explanation:
Tennis Shoes.

	Jeff Talley told Officer Anders not to wear tennis shoes to work because no one in the community would take him seriously as an officer.  They were red and black tennis shoes.

questions.text: What was the name of the EMT that Talley chose to accompany him to the the house to get the injured Walter Smith?
questions.explanation:
Ridley.

	Talley had Anders list off who the EMT's on duty were and he chose Ridley to go with him up to the house.  Talley, Anders, and Ridley stripped down to their underwear to show the kidnappers that they weren't armed.

questions.text: Tommy Smith saw Jeff Talley on TV and contacted the police department wanting to talk to him directly about what was going on in the house.
questions.explanation:
True.

	Tommy was connected to Jeff's cell phone through the Police Department.

questions.text: Jeff Talley and his wife Jane were getting divorced.
questions.explanation:
False.

	Jeff and Jane were not getting divorced.  Their daughter, Amanda, was acting up because she was worried that they were getting divorced.

questions.text: Which of the following actors did NOT star in this film?
questions.explanation:
Kristen Scott Thomas.

	Serena Scott Thomas starred as Jane Talley in this film.  Kristen Scott Thomas is her sister who starred in "The Horse Whisperer", "The English Patient", and "Mission Impossible".
